statements: SELECT * FROM accidents WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT accident_date, location FROM accidents WHERE accident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT description FROM accidents WHERE accident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT accident_id, location FROM accidents ORDER BY accident_id DESC;

SELECT * FROM accidents WHERE accident_date = '2022-10-15';

SELECT * FROM accidents ORDER BY accident_date DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS num_accidents FROM accidents GROUP BY location HAVING num_accidents > 1;
SELECT accident_id, description FROM accidents WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY accident_date ASC;
